title: Define TypeScript types from API models
description: Create comprehensive TypeScript type definitions that mirror the API's Pydantic models. This ensures type safety across the frontend and enables IDE autocompletion. Types should cover all entities: EvalSuite, EvalCase, EvalRun, EvalResult, CompareResponse, and related enums.
acceptance_criteria: All API entity types defined (EvalSuite, EvalCase, EvalRun, EvalResult, etc.)
All enum types defined (ScorerType, RunStatus, ResultStatus, TriggerType)
Request/response types for all API operations
Types match API Pydantic models exactly
implementation_notes: Reference api/src/models/eval.py for source of truth
Use string literal unions for enums (not TypeScript enums)
Include optional fields where API allows null
Consider generating types from OpenAPI spec in future
